snippet: The staff reductions, to be made by the end of 2014, come after initial cuts failed to deliver sufficient savings in a struggling European economy.
abstract: Air France plans to eliminate additional 2,800 jobs, or 5 percent of its work force, by end of 2014.
lead_paragraph: The staff reductions, to be made by the end of 2014, come after initial cuts failed to deliver sufficient savings in a struggling European economy.

headline.main: Air France Plans to Cut 2,800 More Jobs
headline.print_headline: Air France Plans to Cut 2,800 More Jobs
